page.title: 20COMMUNITY LIFE
page.content: WHAT IS THERE FOR YOUNG PEOPLE TO DO IN THIS AREA? A Youth Club has been opened in our new Community Hall. Every Saturday we can spend two hours in the afternoon and again at night.You can play darts, table tennis, snooker, billiards, dominoes or cards. Teenagers can spend Saturday evening enjoying all these activities as well. It is a welcome change for all the young people to spend time together rather than sitting at home in front of the television. There are plans for adult groups as well. CONTRIBUTIONS FOR THIS PROJECT WERE MADE BY THE FOLLOWING PUPILS:_ Andrew.P.Mackenzie, Ailsa.J.Kinnaird, Calum.I.G.Russell,Craig Mackenzie, Robert.A.Kinnaird,John Mackenzie, Jacquline.A.Mackenzie and Avishai M. S.Russell
